content: **iris crochet afghan square** > this square is used in the 2025 > crochet a block crochet along but can > be used as a **stand alone pattern** > and can be applied to any project **difficulty level/skill required ** easy - intermediate basic stitches in simple variations simple repeats color changes shaping and finishing includes more involved stitch combinations like the popcorn you will need to know basic stitches like the double_crochet double_crochet special stitches explained and links to tutorials are provided **supplies/materials ** yarn - vinnis colours dk nikkim 100% cotton 50 grams/119 meters weight dk 11 wpi 3 light hook - 4 00 mm g clover scissors yarn needle **gauge ** not necessary for this project to be perfect however if you use a different yarn and/or hook sizing will differ using the same hook and yarn will ensure your squares are consistent in size **size ** square - 9 x 9 inches 23 x 23 cm **colors ** approx - 104 - 120 yards 95 - 110 m for complete square a - natural b - cappuccino c - princess aqua d princess lilac e - seychelles f purple mix remember if you use/choose a different yarn weight/hook size your square will be a different size **pattern support** for questions regarding this pattern or any of my patterns you are welcome to join the joanita theron designs facebook group for questions relating to permission or usage email joanita@creativecrochetworkshop com **abbreviations us terminology**
